text:
In Short: We keep your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy notice unless otherwise required by law.
In Short: We may use cookies and other tracking technologies to collect and store your information.
In Short: We only share information with your consent, to comply with laws, to provide you with services, to protect your rights, or to fulfill business obligations.
In Short: We process your information for purposes based on legitimate business interests, the fulfillment of our contract with you, compliance with our legal obligations, and/or your consent.
In this privacy notice, we seek to explain to you in the clearest way possible what information we collect, how we use it and what rights you have in relation to it.
We may process or share data based on the following legal basis: Consent: We may process your data if you have given us specific consent to use your personal information in a specific purpose.
We may process or share data based on the following legal basis: Legitimate Interests: We may process your data when it is reasonably necessary to achieve our legitimate business interests.
We may process or share data based on the following legal basis: Vital Interests: We may disclose your information where we believe it is necessary to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding potential violations of our policies.

In Short: We may use cookies and other tracking technologies to collect and store your information.
We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies (like web beacons and pixels) to access or store information.
In Short: We may collect information regarding your mobile device, push notifications, when you use our apps.
We use the information we collect or receive:
If you use our Apps, we may also collect the following information: Mobile Device Data.

We may process or share data based on the following legal basis: Performance of a Contract: Where we have entered into a contract with you, we may process your personal information to fulfill the terms of our contract.
We process your personal information for these purposes in reliance on our legitimate business interests, in order to enter into or perform a contract with you, with your consent, and/or for compliance with our legal obligations.
We will only keep your personal information for as long as it is necessary for the purposes set out in this privacy notice, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
We use personal information collected via our Services or Apps for a variety of business purposes described below.
